summary: Just a small mod that changes Miraak's clothes to light armor, and adds a new enchantment to the mask.
descriptionHtml: This is really just a personal mod I made for myself, but I thought I'd share it in case anyone else wanted to use it. I have changed all of Miraak's clothes (robes, mask, boots and gloves) to be light armor, and additionally added the enchantment that was on Konahrik's mask to also be on Miraak's mask. The reasoning is, I really liked Miraak's armor, but no other dragon priest masks went as well with the set as Miraak does, but I really like the enchantment on Konahrik, so I put it on Miraak (the mask) so that I could wear the complete set with that enchantment. :)
author: simsim899

files.name: Miraak's Armor (works with light armor perks)
files.fileName: Miraak's Armor (works with light armor perks)-57504-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml: Made it so Miraak's armor set now benefits from the light armor perks custom fit, and matching set.
